entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
